page.title: 08The Old Mill Nursery.
page.content:
The{Old Mill Nursery}has been selling plants and trees since l969. Before this started there was an old {paper mill}on the site.
They grow their own plants and sell them in{Newport Market}on Fridays or to people who come to the nursery.
The owners have no employees to help them,{just the family.} They advertise on a post just outside the Old Mill Nursery and another on the main road.
The plants are arranged in a piece of land an{acre}in size. They sell pot plants, bedding plants, trees, tray plants and open ground plants.The Old Mill Nursery has four{glass houses.} Two}are heated by oil and the other two by solid fuel.
